meanings.definition: A device used to measure surface tension.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a tensiometer to check the surface tension of the water.
meanings.sent2: The tensiometer helped the researcher understand how strong the surface tension of the liquid was.
meanings.sent3: When the tensiometer started beeping, it was like the water was talking back!
meanings.sent4: The tensiometer was like a detective, uncovering the secrets of the liquid's surface tension.
meanings.sent5: With the tensiometer, the surface tension of the liquid became as clear as day.
